resources.string: Password management rights needed to lock and unlock your device.
Enter your desired PIN. Note that this WILL override PIN set elsewhere.
Enter a WiFi network that you trust. When connected to this network, the phone will disable its PIN.
Loki is disabled. Make sure you\'ve defined a PIN and safe WiFi name
Phone will not show keyguard when on a safe network
For security reasons, your device will now be locked with the PIN set in Loki
Loki will run without a PIN (not secure)
Your PIN is required when launching Loki (recommended)
Loki needs admin rights in order to lock and unlock your device
This alpha/beta version of Loki has expired
